author: Nintendo of America
description:
Mounts of Mayhem charges into Minecraft today on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/minecraft-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1012-02&utm_id=P1012-02 

Choose your steed, master the spear, and outsmart foes both familiar and new to become a true champion. Mount up and ride into the mayhem today!  

#NintendoSwitch #Minecraft 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Minecraft – Mounts of Mayhem – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Celebrate over 10 years of adventure and unique content with The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition, now on Nintendo Switch 2: https://nintendo.com/us/store/products/the-elder-scrolls-v-skyrim-anniversary-edition-switch-2/ 

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition brings legendary open-world fantasy to life like never before! 

Owners of the Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch can download the game for free on Nintendo Switch 2, while owners of the base edition on Nintendo Switch can purchase the "Anniversary Upgrade" to then download the game on Nintendo Switch 2. 

This version includes: 
• The Complete Skyrim Experience: Dive into the acclaimed base game and the three official expansions: Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn. 
• Enhancements for Nintendo Switch 2: Enjoy enhanced resolution, improved load times, and optimized performance that take full advantage of Nintendo Switch 2 hardware. 
• Hundreds of Creation Club Items: Discover a massive library of comm
title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
